description: [Lorea](https://lorea.org/) researches free software Internet tools to emancipate your social networks where autonomy, group collaboration, and privacy matter.  Since 2009, Lorea has been _(re-)taking the networks_, with its flagship [N-1](https://n-1.cc/) seed.## M
ohloh_description: Lorea is a project to create secure social cybernetic systems, in which human networks will become simultaneusly represented on a virtual shared world.
name: Lorea
